author: lresende
msg: TUSCANY-2997 - Removing unecessary load of dojo base component

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1604: allow IndexReader.norms to return null if the field has no norms; this is off by default but will be hardwired to on in 3.0

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1617: add -Dtestpackage=XXX and -Dtestpackageroot=lucene to run a package's tests

author: veithen
msg: Some cleanup in the support classes for XSLTMediator:
* Made AXIOMSourceBuilder and AXIOMResultBuilder more symmetric.
* DOOMResultBuilder: replaced deprecated features by the proper methods/classes introduced in Axiom 1.2.8.
* Removed some exclusion rules from XSLTMediatorTest: Saxon works correctly with DOOM from Axiom 1.2.8.
